author: Daniel Greene
description:
YouTube is acting up again, Brandon Sanderson shares his Top 10 favorite video games, and Starship Troopers is getting a reboot?! We’ve got new Jay Kristoff books, stunning new Inheritance Cycle covers, The Odyssey casting updates, 4K IMAX Studio Ghibli releases, and more! Let’s dive into this week’s biggest updates!

00:00 YouTube Is Being Weird Again 🤔: 
➡️ Watch Elliot Brooks’ video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RgsyrsshC-w&ab_channel=ElliotBrooks

01:34 AI Guidelines for Publishing 🤖📚: Major updates on how AI-generated content is being handled.
➡️ More details: https://www.wiley.com/en-us/publish/book/ai-guidelines

05:14 Brandon Sanderson’s Top 10 Video Games 🎮: The author reveals his all-time favorites.
➡️ Read his list: https://www.brandonsanderson.com/blogs/blog/brandon-sandersons-top-10-video-games

09:19 New Jay Kristoff Books Announced! 📖: More grimdark goodness is on the way.
➡️ Check it out: https://www.instagram.com/p/DHD-Ot5ptbd/?hl=en&img_index=1

10:01 Weird
title: Sanderson's Top 10 Games, Wheel Of Time Surges, NEW Jay Kristoff Series || FN
